scripts.dev: nodemon --watch backend/src --exec 'node --import "data:text/javascript,import { register } from \"node:module\"; import { pathToFileURL } from \"node:url\"; register(\"ts-node/esm\", pathToFileURL(\"./\"));"' backend/src/index.ts
scripts.build: tsc && npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
